amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike all after the resolving clause and insert a complete new text entitled "Concurrent Resolution on the Budget for FY 2018" proposed by the Progressive Caucus. Amendment can be found on page H7817 of the Congressional Record dated October 4, 2017.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-339 and offered as the Progressive Caucus proposal.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 108 - 314 (Roll no. 553).

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Grijalva.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Grijalva.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 108 - 314 (Roll no. 553).
